Title: Grants preferences in contracts under the affordable home ownership program to certain police officers, firefighters and teachers
Summary: Provides preferences in contracts under the affordable home ownership program to police officers, teachers and firefighters who live in the municipality or school district in which they work; defines relevant terms.
LawCode: Amd ยง1112, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to preferences under the affordable home ownership development program
